snippet.title: Roboquest - 1.0 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Roboquest is a fast-fps roguelite playable in solo or 2 player cooperation.

Blast your way through hordes of evil bots, customize your character along the way and unlock permanent upgrades to push further into the game each time you retry.

Roboquest is now available on Steam, Xbox Game Pass, PC Game pass, Microsoft Store, Epic Game Store, GOG and GeforceNow.

Play 1.0 now!

Store Links
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/692890/Roboquest/
Gamepass - https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/roboquest/9p47s7njgwzl
Epic Game Store - https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/roboquest-9ad17a

Social Links
X (Twitter) - https://twitter.com/RoboquestGame
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@roboquestgame
Join the community on Discord - discord.gg/Roboquest
